name: Spelldash
description:
Spelldash is a fast-paced FPS parkour game where you use elemental spells and environment to run through levels




Use environmental elements like jumpers, jump pads, wallrunning, speed pads, rocket jump pads, bubble jumps and more to traverse the levels quickest and the most creative way possible

Use fire, air, ice and lightning elements, all with unique usages to eliminate the enemies

Features

  • Fast paced, intense parkour action
  • Unique campaign, collectathon and challenge modes
  • Open ended levels that can be completed in many ways
  • 4 different elemental spells to eliminate enemies
  • Many different abilities to traverse the levels in different ways
  • Stylized environments
  • Global leaderboards
